name: guessword
description: * exam02/part02/ holds a create-react-app application (the package.json, src/ directory and other directories are directly inside part02/.  This will require some effort on your part. * exam02/part02/package.json * exam02/part02/alfred.js * exam02/part02/barbara.js * exam02/part02/wordlist.js * exam02/part02/src/config.json * other files directories within exam02/part02/ as needed/desired

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run alfred" "npm run barbara" "npm run start"
